calendar_event_management.title: Automatic Duration Calculation
calendar_event_management.description: Implement automatic duration calculation for class schedules based on class type and frequency.
comments: Part of Calendar & Event Management improvements. Will integrate with class types and durations for automatic end date calculation.

calendar_event_management.title: Recurring Schedule Handling - Every Second Week
calendar_event_management.description: Add support for 'Every second week' recurring schedule pattern in the calendar system.
comments: Part of Calendar & Event Management improvements. Will enhance the recurring schedule options.

calendar_event_management.title: Recurring Schedule Handling - Last Saturday of Month
calendar_event_management.description: Add support for 'Last Saturday of month' recurring schedule pattern in the calendar system.
comments: Part of Calendar & Event Management improvements. Will enhance the recurring schedule options.

calendar_event_management.title: Recurring Schedule Handling - Custom Patterns
calendar_event_management.description: Implement support for custom recurring schedule patterns in the calendar system.
comments: Part of Calendar & Event Management improvements. Will allow for more flexible scheduling options.
